actions.committee: House Committee on Ways and Means
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Ways and Means.

official_title: A bill to provide that the Secretary of the Treasury shall make a study of the overwithholding from wages of the Federal income tax and report, with legislative recommendations, to the Congress.

summary.text: Directs the Secretary of the Treasury to make a study of the overwithholding from wages of the Federal income tax under the Internal Revenue Code of 1954. Directs the Secretary to report, with legislative recommendations, to the Congress on his study under this Act.

titles.title: A bill to provide that the Secretary of the Treasury shall make a study of the overwithholding from wages of the Federal income tax and report, with legislative recommendations, to the Congress.
